name: Let's Start Fresh!
description: This game was a project done for the School of Visual Arts. The class title was Communications Design with Allison Truch and the assignment was to "Create a book that demonstrated an experience occurred through Covid-19." Naturally, I said fuck the book and made a game on Unity because no one reads books, everyone was and should be gaming. This was my first time ever using the Unity Engine as it probably shows but I had fun making my game instead of a boring book.
